items.title: Don’t miss Gigabyte’s AERO X16 RTX 5070 gaming laptop with 32GB RAM/1TB SSD while it’s $350 off
items.summary:
Best Buy is now offering a 16-inch Gigabyte RTX 5070 AERO X16 gaming laptop with 32GB RAM/1TB SSD for $1,299.99 shipped. This particular config typically goes for $1,650, which means you’re getting a straight-up $350 discount on it right now. We saw the RTX 5060 variant of this notebook drop to $1,050 a couple of days ago, which has since jumped back up in price, but this is the first time we’re seeing this one with an RTX 5070 drop this low. Amazon currently has this laptop listed for $1,450, so you might want to cash in on this deal at Best Buy to lock the best price before it climbs back to full price. Head below for details if you want to learn more about it before adding it to the cart.

more…

items.title: I use Aqara’s HomeKit-ready M2 Hub with infrared to control my fireplace, grab it for $37 (Reg. $60)
items.summary:
Aqara M2 Smart IR HomeKit Hub

Buy for $37 (Reg. $60)

What we love

If there’s some gear around your house that you’d like to control with infrared or would simply like to tap into more of Aqara’s portfolio of smart home device, this hub is here to help. I personally picked one of these up last year to control my wall mounted fireplace that relies on infrared to be toggled on and off. With it, I was able to set up a Siri Shortcut to turn it on and off. The hub has also allowed me to adopt more Aqara devices that require its hub for HomeKit integration.

more…
